mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: We're passionate about connecting coffee lovers with amazing roasters. Discover your next favorite brew with us.

discoverLocal.title: Discover Local
discoverLocal.description: Find amazing coffee roasters in your neighborhood and beyond.

buildCommunity.title: Build Community
buildCommunity.description: Connect with fellow coffee lovers and share your favorite discoveries.

qualityFirst.title: Quality First
qualityFirst.description: Every roaster in our platform is carefully curated for excellence.

story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: The Beans was born from a simple frustration: finding truly exceptional coffee shouldn't be hard. As coffee enthusiasts ourselves, we noticed that the best roasters were often hidden gems, known only to locals or discovered by chance.
story.paragraph2: We created The Beans to change that. Our platform brings together passionate coffee roasters and curious coffee lovers in one beautiful, easy-to-use community.
story.paragraph3: Whether you're searching for that perfect espresso blend, or wanting to discover what's roasting in your neighborhood, The Beans is your guide to coffee excellence.

sustainability.title: Sustainability
sustainability.description: We champion roasters that prioritize ethical sourcing, fair trade practices, and environmental responsibility.

community.title: Community
community.description: Coffee brings people together. We foster connections between coffee roasters and coffee lovers that extend beyond transactions.

quality.title: Quality
quality.description: We believe everyone deserves exceptional coffee. That's why we carefully curate every roaster on our platform.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We're constantly improving our platform to make discovering and enjoying great coffee easier and more delightful.

team.title: Meet the Team
team.subtitle: Coffee Enthusiasts
team.description: We're a small but passionate team of coffee lovers, designers, and developers who believe that great coffee experiences should be accessible to everyone. Our diverse backgrounds in technology, hospitality, and coffee culture inform everything we build.

cta.title: Ready to Discover Amazing Coffee?
cta.subtitle: Join our community and start exploring the best coffee your area has to offer.

cookies.title: Cookie Policy
cookies.subtitle: Simple and clear information about how we use cookies on The Beans

whatAreCookies.title: What Are Cookies?
whatAreCookies.description: Cookies are small text files that websites store on your device (computer, phone, or tablet) when you visit them. Think of them as tiny digital notes that help websites remember things about you.
whatAreCookies.analogy: It's like when you visit your favorite coffee shop and the barista remembers your usual order - cookies help our website remember your preferences and provide a better experience.

essential.title: Essential Cookies (Always On)
essential.description: These cookies are necessary for our website to work properly. They help you log in, navigate between pages, and use basic features. We can't turn these off because the site wouldn't work without them.

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies (Optional)
analytics.description: These help us understand how people use our website so we can make it better. For example, they tell us which pages are most popular or if people are having trouble finding something.

preferences.title: Preference Cookies (Optional)
preferences.description: These remember your choices like your language preference (English or French), your favorite roasters, and other settings that make your experience more personalized.

managing.title: Managing Your Cookie Preferences
managing.description: You have control over cookies! You can change your cookie settings at any time through your web browser. Here's how:

browserSettings.title: Browser Settings
browserSettings.chrome: Chrome: Settings > Privacy and security > Cookies and other site data
browserSettings.firefox: Firefox: Settings > Privacy & Security > Cookies and Site Data
browserSettings.safari: Safari: Preferences > Privacy > Manage Website Data
browserSettings.edge: Edge: Settings > Cookies and site permissions > Cookies and site data

warning.title: Important:
warning.description: If you disable essential cookies, some parts of our website may not work properly. Optional cookies can be disabled without affecting basic functionality.

contact.title: Questions About Cookies?
contact.description: If you have any questions about how we use cookies or want to learn more about our privacy practices, feel free to contact us:

intro.title: 1. Introduction
intro.description: The Beans ("we," "our," or "us") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our coffee roaster discovery platform.

personal.title: Personal Information
personal.email: Email address (for account creation and communication)
personal.profile: Profile information you choose to provide
personal.location: Location data when you search for nearby roasters

usage.title: Usage Information
usage.reviews: Reviews, ratings, and photos you submit
usage.interactions: Your interactions with roasters and other users

dataUsage.title: 3. How We Use Your Information
dataUsage.provide: Provide and maintain our roaster discovery service
dataUsage.communicate: Communicate with you about your account and our services
dataUsage.improve: Improve our platform and develop new features
dataUsage.security: Protect against fraud and ensure platform security
dataUsage.legal: Comply with legal obligations and resolve disputes

dataSharing.title: 4. Information Sharing and Disclosure
dataSharing.intro: We do not sell your personal information. We may share information in the following circumstances:
dataSharing.public: Public information like reviews and ratings are visible to other users
dataSharing.consent: With your explicit consent for specific purposes
dataSharing.legal: When required by law or to protect our legal rights
dataSharing.business: In connection with a business transfer or acquisition
dataSharing.aggregated: Aggregated, anonymized data for analytics and research

cookies.title: 5. Cookies and Tracking
cookies.description: We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your experience:
cookies.essential: Essential cookies for login and security
cookies.preferences: Preference cookies to remember your settings
cookies.analytics: Analytics cookies to understand usage patterns
cookies.control: You can control cookies through your browser settings, though some features may not work without certain cookies.

security.title: 6. Data Security
security.description: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. However, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure.

retention.title: 7. Data Retention
retention.description: We retain your personal information for as long as necessary to provide our services and fulfill the purposes outlined in this policy. You may delete your account at any time, after which we will remove or anonymize your personal data within 30 days.

rights.title: 8. Your Rights and Choices
rights.intro: You have the following rights regarding your personal information:
rights.access: Access and review your personal data
rights.delete: Request deletion of your personal data
rights.export: Export your data in a portable format
rights.withdraw: Withdraw consent where processing is based on consent
rights.contact: To exercise these rights, please contact us through your account settings or email us directly.

international.title: 9. International Users
international.description: The Beans is based in Canada. If you are accessing our service from outside Canada, please be aware that your information may be transferred to, stored, and processed in Canada where our servers are located and our central database is operated.

children.title: 10. Children's Privacy
children.description: Our service is not directed to children under 13 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13. If we learn we have collected such information, we will delete it immediately.

changes.title: 11. Changes to This Policy
changes.description: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new policy on this page and updating the "Last updated" date. We encourage you to review this policy periodically.

contact.title: 12. Contact Us
contact.description: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or our privacy practices, please contact us:

welcome.title: 1. Welcome to The Beans
welcome.description: The Beans is a platform that helps coffee lovers discover local roasters and share their experiences. By using our service, you agree to these terms.

acceptance.title: 2. Accepting These Terms
acceptance.description: By creating an account or using The Beans, you confirm you are at least 13 years old and agree to follow these rules.

content.title: 4. Your Content
content.description: You own the reviews and photos you post. By sharing them on The Beans, you give us permission to display them to help other users discover great coffee. You can delete your content anytime.

privacy.title: 5. Your Privacy
privacy.description: We respect your privacy and only use your information to improve your experience on The Beans. We don't sell your personal data to third parties.

service.title: 6. Our Service
service.description: We work hard to keep The Beans running smoothly, but we can't guarantee it will always be perfect. We may need to update or temporarily pause the service for maintenance.

changes.title: 7. Changes to These Terms
changes.description: We may update these terms occasionally. If we make significant changes, we'll let you know. Continuing to use The Beans means you accept the new terms.

contact.title: 8. Questions?
contact.description: If you have questions about these terms, please contact us at support@thebeans.app
